channel.title: Dueling ring [pi]
channel.description: hey guys, im using pi base server and i wont to know if anyone knows how to make it so when you teleport useing a dueling ring or golry you lose charges. if someone knows please help me out thanks

item.title: Dueling ring [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Im fairly certain i released something on this ages ago, but simply you could add it on your itemclicking class.

Something like,
if itemId != ring of dueling(1)
{
replaceItem = getItemId(), getItemId() - 2
} else {
deleteItem(getItemId())
}

I believe that the ring of dueling goes down 1 charge every 2 item ids, so this would work.
You may not have the replaceItem method, but all it is, is a grouped deleteItem and addItem method.

Read full topic
